title: The Free Alistar that you receive from subscribing to youtube has been removed.
body:
I was going to show my friend how to get Alistar for free but when I clicked on the link for it only a white screen appeared. 
Leagueoflegends.com/youtube
Also, it appears the free champion list has been updated and Alistar is removed
See: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202083184-Promotional-Content-Free-Swag-
Please, Upvote so we can bring back Unchained Alistar for the new players.

replies.body:
Actually its not gone, there's just a long withstanding bug that stops them from delivering it automatically; but, If you send in a support ticket they will give it to you.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us
Yup, this is the case. Sorry for the confusion/trouble. Please shoot us a ticket and we can get him added to your account! ^-^
When it will be available at another regions?
Unfortunately, I don't have any info on that. :c
Thanks for asking!! =)
in other regions*

> [{quoted}](name=iguy,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Uawwp5t5,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-03-27T21:30:16.816+0000)
>
> Actually its not gone, there's just a long withstanding bug that stops them from delivering it automatically; but, If you send in a support ticket they will give it to you.
> 
> https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us

Everyone I know that's gotten the free skin had to email them to get it. The Youtube page is bugged :s
yea I had the same issue when I started and did this and they gave him to me
Send an email to riot via the customer support. I did it recently and they gave it to me. Fast response too it took them less than 2-3 hours.
They even made a bot for it a few weeks ago. It should give you the skin within 5seconds-5minutes

> [{quoted}](name=HighH1,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Uawwp5t5,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-03-28T04:04:56.948+0000)
>
> They even made a bot for it a few weeks ago. It should give you the skin within 5seconds-5minutes

What do I put into the ticket? What category etc?
I don't remember actually,just do what you feel is what it's in. If it matter Riot will tell you where to put it. If not the bot will find your request and give you your skin+champ
Can confirm the support method & bug issues. I believe you only get the skins free also so you need to have the champ.
Nah, I got Tristana and Alistar both for free when I first started by doing the free skins.

Maybe it was a bug for me then. I got them a while ago and it was really hard to get the promos to work and the pages were poorly advertised and worded on top of that. Some friends remember getting a different garen skin too. Who knows. More bugs? lol.

I got Dreadknight Garen, Golden? Unchained? Alistar, and.. That one Trist skin.  By liking them on each of the pages.  It didn't always make sense reading the instructions, but I basically just "liked"  each of them, then if I remember correctly sent a support ticket.. Because that just seemed like an easy way to do it.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/F6nPNQcj-how-to-unlock-your-free-unchained-alistar-skin

enjoy
True, I saw default {{champion:12}} for the first time the other day and it was a sight to behold.
There was a site that was up for a while that enabled you to get it but i can't find it anymore {{item:3070}}
submit a ticket and you still will get it. Is just not automatic anymore
I can confirm the ticket works. There is a bug that's been there for a while now so you can't get it. Just send in a ticket and explain. I got an automated response within 10 mins.
send a ticket to riot
The riot girl one is still active https://www.facebook.com/leagueoflegends/app/208195102528120/
